name: QueroQuitar Ltda.
description: Developer of a debt negotiation platform designed to help users with the online negotiation process. The company's platform provides privacy, independence, and security in operations carried out by debtors, facilitating access to the solution of their debts, without intermediaries, and also provides information and tips on how to improve the financial planning of families, helping debtors and individuals to handle their debt online on a single platform.
one_liner: Developer of a debt negotiation platform designed to help users with the online negotiation process. The company's platform provides privacy, independence, and security in operations carried out by debtors, facilitating access to the solution of their debts, without intermediaries, and also provides information and tips on how to improve the financial planning of families, helping debtors and individuals to handle their debt online on a single platform.
